name: paperless-ai
description: Paperless AI is an enhanced fork of Paperless designed for intelligent document scanning, OCR, and metadata tagging, enabling smarter search over digitized documents in a self-hosted setup.
features: AI-powered OCR: Advanced optical character recognition with machine learning extracts text from scanned documents with high accuracy
Intelligent tagging: Automatic metadata extraction and tag suggestions based on document content to improve organization
Smart classification: AI algorithms automatically categorize documents by type, sender, or content for streamlined filing
Full-text search: Search across all document content including OCR-extracted text to quickly find specific information
Document scanning: Import documents from scanners, email, or file uploads with automatic processing and indexing
Version control: Track document changes over time with version history and ability to restore previous versions
Custom workflows: Configure automated processing rules for document routing, tagging, and organization based on content
Multi-format support: Handle various document formats including PDF, images, Office files with unified processing
Secure storage: Encrypted document storage with access controls ensures sensitive information remains protected
API integration: RESTful API enables integration with other systems for automated document submission and retrieval
